name: SuperNova (itch) (CasaNuestra)
description:
You are trapped within a field of asteroids and spikes. Enemies will spawn randomly and  will kill you if you touch them. Lead them into spikes and asteroids to kill them. Try and survive for as long as you can.

How to play:

- W, A, S, D or arrow keys to move.

- Right click to send yourself flying =)
